20.speaker: Narrator
20.text: Ọmọtẹmi returns to Ogun’s forge, the ancient artifact glowing softly in her hands. The rhythmic clang of metal fills the air as Ogun turns to face her.
20.scene_description: Molten metal glows in the forge, and sparks fly as Ogun hammers iron with precise, deliberate strokes.

21.speaker: Ogun
21.text: Ọwọ́ rẹ̀ ti fi ìṣẹ́ han! Ìyàwó ogun ò mọ’ra, ṣùgbọ́n èyí ni apá iṣẹ́ tí ó kù. Ẹ̀kúnrẹ́rẹ́ yóò wà lọ́dọ̀ Èṣù.
21.translation: Your hands have done well! The warrior’s path is not yet complete, but this is the next step. The full truth lies with Èṣù.
21.scene_description: Ogun studies the artifact, his gaze thoughtful, as if recalling an ancient memory.
